author: bencomic

panels.narration: after some crap chibilain spouted about some girl and a job:

right.text: seventh because it makes us feel better about ourselves, like hanging out with an ugly guy. by comparison, you look like a STTUUUDDDD

left.text: why are girls friends with people they hate?

right.text: you're a freak, you're the ugly guy i'd hang out with

left.text: i don't hang out with ugly guys! ugly guys are FREAKS!

right.text: "crank" and "girls" go on a date, and things get serious, but then "crank" breaks up with "girls", leaving "girls" heartbroken!!

title: u-g-l-y, you ain't got no alibi
